greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number T(n,k) of set partitions of [n] with alternating parity of elements and exactly k blocks; triangle T(n,k), n>=0, 0<=k<=n, read by rows.
link: Alois P. Heinz, Rows n = 0..35, flattened
maple: b:= proc(l, i, t) option remember; `if`(l=[], x,
T:= n-> `if`(n=0, 1, (p-> seq(coeff(p, x, j), j=0..n))(
mathematica: b[l_, i_, t_] := b[l, i, t] = If[l == {}, x, If[l[[1]] == t, 0, Expand[x*b[Rest[l], 1, 1 - t]]] + Sum[If[l[[j]] == t, 0, b[Delete[l, j], j, 1 - t]], {j, i, Length[l]}]];
T[n_] := If[n==0, {1}, Function[p, Table[Coefficient[p, x, j], {j, 0, n}]][ b[Table[Mod[i, 2], {i, 2, n}], 1, 1]]];
xref: Cf. A124419, A274310 (parities alternate within blocks), A305823.
results.author: _Alois P. Heinz_, Jun 29 2016
